string.name: name
string.value: Research on Animal Fossils

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Betty's Research on Fossils
Dr. Betty in Ellinia told me that she needs #b1 #t4031151##k for her research. She asked me to find her daughter near Henesys, and bring it back to her. Where would Anne be?
I met Dr.Betty's daughter, Ann, playing near Henesys by herself.

These are indeed 20 samples. They are in pretty good shape, too. Thank you for your hard work. This will help me immensely on my studies with the plant fossils. Just the way Dr. Winston designed it. Well, I have one more favor to ask... will you help me out?

To start working on the animal fossils, I'll need samples I can compare with. Looking at these fossils, Drake's skulls seem like a perfect sample for comparison. Can you get me some of Drake's skulls?

Ah, don't be too shocked. I know Drakes are not to be messed with for most people. I have #b#t4031151##k that I've gathered up a few years ago. The problem is, I didn't bring it with me to Ellinia because I'm here right now for plant fossils. Since I can't leave this place, I'm hoping you can get it for me.
Around Henesys, you'll find my daughter. Ask her for #b#t4031151##k. Her name is #bAnne#k.
I thought you were going to help me out there ... oh well, I'll see you around.
Can I ... help you?? \r\n#L0# #bYour dad asked me to see you.\r\n#L1# Your mom asked me to see you.#k
My mom sent you here? For what? \r\n#L0# #bShe asked me to get some preserved Drake's Skulls from you..#k\r\n#L1# #bShe asked me to get a crushed Drake's Skull from you.#k

I know I have them. I'll have to check and see if you're indeed sent by my mom, though. What's her name?
#L0# #bBettie#k
#L1# #bBatty#k
#L2# #bBetty#k

Where did you meet my mom? 
#L0##bPerion#k
#L1# #bEllinia#k
#L2# #bKerning City#k
#L3# #bHenesys#k
#L4# #bSleepywood#k

What's the color of her shoes? 
#L0# #bBlack#k
#L1# #bBlue#k
#L2# #bRed#k
#L3##b #bYellow#k

What's the color of the book that my mom is holding? 
#L0# #bBlack#k
#L1# #bBlue#k
#L2# #bRed#k
#L3# #bGreen#k

Last question. What's the color of the earrings that my mom is wearing? 
#L0# #bBlack#k
#L1# #bBlue#k
#L2# #bRed#k
#L3# #bYellow#k
Oh my goodness, you got them all right! My mom DID send u here.
Hey, I don't have a dad. You CREEP!!!! Who are you???
I don't have any of crushed Drake's skulls here. Something's not right about you.
You're wrong. A stranger indeed.
You're wrong. A stranger indeed.
Liar!!! Who are you!!!! HELP!!
Liar!!! Who are you!!!! HELP!!
Liar!!! Who are you!!!! HELP!!
Liar!!! Who are you!!!! HELP!!
You're wrong. A stranger indeed.
You're wrong. A stranger indeed.
You're wrong. A stranger indeed.
Wrong. Are you sure you've met my mom?
Wrong. Are you sure you've met my mom?
Wrong. Are you sure you've met my mom?
You're wrong. A stranger indeed.
You're wrong. A stranger indeed.
You're wrong. A stranger indeed.
